class_description:
Underlying security services instantiate and pass a
 PasswordCallback to the handle
 method of a CallbackHandler to retrieve password information.

params.param_description: the prompt used to request the password.

true if the password should be displayed
                  as it is being typed.

Methods.method_description:
Construct a PasswordCallback with a prompt
 and a boolean specifying whether the password should be displayed
 as it is being typed.

return_description: the retrieved password, which may be null.

Methods.method_description:
Get the retrieved password.

 
 This method returns a copy of the retrieved password.

 

See also:

return_description:
the whether the password
          should be displayed as it is being typed.

Methods.method_description:
Return whether the password
 should be displayed as it is being typed.

params.param_description: the retrieved password, which may be null.

Methods.method_description:
Set the retrieved password.

 
 This method makes a copy of the input password
 before storing it.

 

See also:
